title: lucasjansen1980

content: #CATENA_Network#CMCX_CoinDear All, This is one of our proud moments in the CORE MultiChain project’s journey. We would like to congratulate you all on the CORE Wallet official launch on the Google Play platform. User can now download the CORE Wallet app directly from Google Play Store, and update accordingly. ✨➖➖➖➖➖✅ Get it on Google Play: Download (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.corewallet&pli=1) ✨➖➖➖➖➖CORE MultiChain Media: Web (https://coremultichain.com/) Wallet Web (https://wallet.coremultichain.com/) Twitter (https://twitter.com/COREMultichain)  YouTube (https://www.youtube.com/c/coremultichain) TG Channel (https://t.me/COREMultiChain) TG Chat (https://t.me/coremultichaingroup) Github (https://github.com/COREMultichain) LinkedIn (https://www.linkedin.com/company/coremultichain/) Instagram (https://www.instagram.com/coremultichain/) ➖➖➖➖➖TOGETHER WE GROW ⚡️➖➖➖➖➖#COREMultichain #CMCX #COREWalletApp #COREWallet #blockchain #CORE #cryptocurrency #cryptowallet#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin

comments.created_time: February 09, 2023, 10:14:15 AMLast edit: June 09, 2023, 10:52:25 AM by lucasjansen1980
comments.body: Experience the power of Web3 with the CORE Multichain wallet. With this single application, you can explore everything Web3 has to offer, including NFT collections from marketplaces built on supported networks. Buy, sell, and securely store your NFTs with complete privacy and security. The CORE wallet is built on the privacy-centric CORE Multichain framework, so you can be sure that all your keys, wallet, and funds are kept safe. Enjoy a unique Web3 experience with the CORE Multichain wallet today!#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin

comments.body: #CATENA_Network#CMCX_CoinFeel free to download the new version: https://wallet.coremultichain.com or Get it on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.corewallet&pli=1The CORE Wallet is a multi-coin platform, supporting all the EVM compatible chains, such as Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, HECO, and Gnosis, as well as the CORE Blockchain. It facilitates features such as Swap, CMCX Staking, NFTs, etc.1. Downloadable Version - Beta Test (from the official website); ✅2. Google Play Store; ✅3. App Store. 4. Web wallets.  5. Desktop wallets. #CORE #CMCX#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin
